descriptionHtml:
My third preset.. Combining ELFX with ELE for a pretty looking skyrim that rivalled some of the ENB presets, without the huge drop in performance.

Requirement Mod (Tweaks are done based on these mods)
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423/?]Pure Weather[/url] - For Exterior Lighting, and probably IMHO the best weather mod in Skyrim
2) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]ELFX[/url] - Interior light bulb, adds light source where it make sense.
3) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59733/?]ELE[/url] - The main mod for interior lighting. Normalized imagespace. Hard to explained, and while its main focus is for ENB, it work as flawlessly for non ENB setting such as this too.

Recommended Mod (Not Required, but they are capable replacement for ENB modules which arent available to sweetfx users)
1) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36917/?]Sun Glare [/url] A texture replacement for ENB GodRay.
2) [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]Dynavision[/url] Providing DoF effect, without the fps loss; also get the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60097/?]unofficial dynavision patch[/url] for the static mod awesomeness.


[b]Installation[/b]

1) Install SweetFX.
2) Extract or copy all the files from this download into the Skyrim directory, allow to overwrite. 

The installed files are:
[i]SweetFX_preset.txt 
Really_SweetFX.txt 
[/i]
Making it compatible with ENBoost.
1) Unzipped SweetFX package in a different folder.
2) Rename the file d3d9.dll into Sweet_d3d9.dll
3) Copy everything in Skyrim directory.
4) Open file enblocal.ini
5) Make sure these are set
[PROXY]
EnableProxyLibrary=[b]true[/b]
ProxyLibrary=Sweet_d3d9.dll
[GLOBAL]
UsePatchSpeedhackWithoutGraphics=[b]true[/b]
6) Extract or copy all the files from this download into the Skyrim directory, allow to overwrite. 

[b].::CREDIT::.[/b]
CeeJay.dk, for SweetFX .. or all this are not possible 
--JawZ-- .. allowing me to include his custom shader for version 1.1
Gamwich, for his texture mods, which I used all 
Requiem team, Xarrian and now ogerboss, for they make Skyrim a better game overall.
and Bethesda.. for all the good time back from Arena and Daggerfall till Skyrim.
author: Deane
